short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple plugin to change your editor's font family

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I've always preferred monospaced fonts, but on Mac, the default font Menlo feels a bit too squished. So, I thought that until Leetcode adds the ability to customize fonts on their website, I can adjust it myself.
